    Constructors in GUI with parameters of type ScreenManager
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    BattleScreen(ScreenManager incScrMan, boolean isWildBattle, int enemyTeamIndex)
    The constructor for the battle screen, it initializes the relevant variables, and calls initialize to initialize the gui and then calls update to display the gui properly.
     
    GameOverScreen(ScreenManager incScrMan)
    Initializes the screen, getting the game environment from the screen manager.
     
    ItemScreen(ScreenManager incScrMan)
    Creates the item screen, initializing the gui and getting the game environment from the screen manager.
     
    MainScreen(ScreenManager incScrMan)
    The constructor, initializes the gui and gets the game environment from the screen manager.
     
    SetupScreen(ScreenManager incScrMan)
    Initializes the gui for the screen and gets the game environment from the screen manager.
     
    ShopScreen(ScreenManager incScrMan)
    Initializes the gui and gets the game environment from the screen manager.
     
    TeamScreen(ScreenManager incScrMan)
    Initializes the gui and gets the game environment from the screen manager.
